description: Returns the Compute Optimizer enrollment (opt-in) status of organization member accounts, if your account is an organization management account. To get the enrollment status of standalone accounts, use the  GetEnrollmentStatus action.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An array of objects to specify a filter that returns a more specific list of account enrollment statuses. (dict) --- Describes a filter that returns a more specific list of account enrollment statuses. Use this filter with the  GetEnrollmentStatusesForOrganization action. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Specify Status to return accounts with a specific enrollment status (for example, Active). values (list) --- The value of the filter. The valid values are Active, Inactive, Pending, and Failed. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Specify Status to return accounts with a specific enrollment status (for example, Active).

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The value of the filter. The valid values are Active, Inactive, Pending, and Failed.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of account enrollment statuses to return with a single request. You can specify up to 100 statuses to return with each request. To retrieve the remaining results, make another request with the returned nextToken value.

nested_items.name: accountEnrollmentStatuses
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the enrollment statuses of organization member accounts.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the account enrollment status.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix epoch timestamp, in seconds, of when the account enrollment status was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to advance to the next page of account enrollment statuses.
